article.title: August 2014 Galaxy News
article.content:
The August 2014 Galaxy Update Newsletter is out. Here's a preview of what's inside:

  • GCC2015 will be held in Norwich, United Kingdom, 6-8 July 2015
  • GCC2014 was a tremendous success. Watch the talks, review the slides, posters, and BoF writeups.
  • ISMB and BOSC 2014 slides, posters and videos too.
  • 53 new papers
  • One new public server (IM-PET)
  • Who's hiring? It turns out that lots of places are.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
